skills.name: CLOVEN CROWN
desc: • Deals random damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Extend Beneficial Effect Duration by 1 turn for each ally.
• Inflict Exhaust on all enemies for 1 turn.
• Deal Additional Random Damage to all enemies for each Golden Effect on each ally.

skills.name: UNRIVALED STRENGTH
desc: • Steal Beneficial Effects, including Golden Effects, from all enemies.
• Grant an Extra Turn to each ally.

skills.name: CRETAN BULL
desc: • Reduces all damage taken by 20% for self.
• Grants Immunity to Sleep and Perfect Sleep to all allies.
• Grants Perfect Accuracy, Perfect Health, and Increase ATK, MAGIC, DEF, and MR to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle..
